title: Kenya Red Cross
subtitle: We will be joining other Kenyans in the #StepForSafety walk on 8th September 2019. The issue of refugees is a humanitarian issue and we stand in solidarity with the over 24 million Africans who have fled their homes. #WithRefugees. Join us!pic.twitter.com/Dk0TrVV5KK

title: IOM Yemen
subtitle: Yesterday, a total number of 140 refugees (36 men, 42 women, 30 boys and 32 girls), who had departed from Aden seaport, have made it safely to Berbera in Somalia. This took place as part of IOM and @UNHCRYemen joint Assisted Spontaneous Return movement.  pic.twitter.com/pJi2BNFkgn
